params.name: find_desc
params.description: Parameter defines the query you want to search. You can use anything that you would use in a regular Yelp search.

params.name: find_loc
params.description: Parameter defines from where you want the search to originate. You can use any location you would use in a regular Yelp search. Following location formats are acceptable:- 706 Mission St, San Francisco, CA- San Francisco, CA- San Francisco, CA 94103- 94103

params.name: l
params.description: Parameter defines the distance (map radius) or neighborhoods you want to search in. You can use our JSON endpoint to fetch values for either of them.Values for distance are accessible through filters.distance (e.g. value for 'Bird's-eye View' is g:-97.86003112792969,30.21635515266855,-97.65541076660156,30.394199462058317).You can also specify neighborhoods to search in. Values for neighborhoods are accessible through filters.neighborhoods.The value for a single neighborhood is formed in the next order:filters.neighborhoods.value + filters.neighborhoods.list[0].value (e.g. p:TX:Austin::Downtown).You can also set value for multiple neighborhoods:filters.neighborhoods.value + [filters.neighborhoods.list[0].value,filters.neighborhoods.list[1].value] (e.g. p:TX:Austin::[Downtown,East_Austin]).Distance and neighborhoods values can't be used together.

params.name: yelp_domain
params.description: Parameter defines the Yelp domain to use. It defaults to yelp.com. Head to the Yelp domains for a full list of supported Yelp domains.

params.name: cflt
params.description: Parameter is used to define a category. It can be used alongside find_desc parameter to refine the search.

params.name: sortby
params.description: Parameter is used for sorting results. Available options:recommended - Recommended (default)rating - Highest Ratedreview_count - Most Reviewed

params.name: attrs
params.description: Parameter is used for refining results. You can add more filters like 'price', 'features', etc. to your search. You can use our JSON endpoint to fetch values. Values for filters are accessible through filters (e.g. value for filtering results by 'No Smoking' is Smoking.no).You can also use multiple values:filters.features[0].value,filters.features[1].value (e.g. GoodForKids,DogsAllowed)

params.name: start
params.description: Parameter defines the result offset. It skips the given number of results. It's used for pagination. (e.g., 0 (default) is the first page of results, 10 is the 2nd page of results, 20 is the 3rd page of results, etc.).

params.name: yandex_domain
params.description: Parameter defines the Yandex Images domain to use. It defaults to yandex.com. Head to the Yandex domains for a full list of supported Yandex domains.

params.name: width
params.description: Parameter defines the width of an image. It can only be used in combination with height parameter.

params.name: height
params.description: Parameter defines the height of an image. It can only be used in combination with width parameter.

params.name: file_type
params.description: Parameter is used for filtering images by file type. It can be set to:jpg - JPG file extensionpng - PNG file extensiongifan - GIF file extension

params.name: color
params.description: Parameter is used for filtering images by color. It can be set to:color - Color images onlygray - Black and whitered - Red colororange - Orange coloryellow - Yellow colorcyan - Cyan colorgreen - Green colorblue - Blue colorviolet - Violet colorwhite - White colorblack - Black color

params.name: orientation
params.description: Parameter is used for filtering images by orientation. It can be set to:horizontal - Horizontalvertical - Verticalsquare - Square

params.name: image_type
params.description: Parameter is used for filtering images by image type. It can be set to:photo - Photographclipart - White backgroundlineart - Drawings and sketchesdemotivator - Demotivatorface - People

params.name: site
params.description: Parameter is used for filtering images by their source. Example value: www.shutterstock.com.

params.name: recent
params.description: Parameter is used for showing images that appeared in the last 7 days.

params.name: url
params.description: Parameter defines the URL for an image to perform the reverse image search.

params.name: crop
params.description: Parameter is used to crop the image and perform the reverse search on the cropped part of the image. E.g. 0.04;0.46;0.27;0.84.These coordinates are formatted in the next order: left edge;top edge;right edge;bottom edge. The minimum and maximum for each coordinate are 0 and 1, respectively.

params.name: crop_id
params.description: Parameter is used to filter results by a specific section of an image. Parameter will only work with images uploaded by Yandex (e.g. https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/rest-of-the-image-url).crop and crop_id parameters should not be used together.

params.name: tab
params.description: Parameter defines the specific tab for the reverse image search. Yandex defaults to the 'About the image' tab. It can be set to:about - 'About the image' tab resultssimilar - 'Similar images' tab results.

params.name: p
params.description: Parameter defines the page number. Pagination starts from 0, and it can return up to 30 results.

params.description: Parameter fetches reviews that are not recommended by Yelp. It can be set to true to only show not recommended reviews, or false to show recommended reviews. By default, only recommended reviews are shown.
